item.title: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]
item.dc:creator: @Ewa_Hax Patrick.
item.description:
@Ewa_Hax wrote:

Change playercommand to playerCommand. And at the bottom of the class file try deleting a bracket (which is a } ) or adding one.

Read full topic
item.source: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]

item.title: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

for posting, i should of nitced that c. was missing

code atm is :

if(c.playerRights >= 1) {

		if (playercommand.equalsIgnoreCase("staffisland")) {
			c.teleportToX = 2794;
			c.teleportToY = 3322;
			c.heightLevel = 0;
	     		c.sendMessage("Welcome to the staff island!");
                 		c.sendMessage("Relax with fellow staff and sort players problems out from a distance.");
			} else {
			c.sendMessage("Sorry you are not staff.");
	     }

any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2009, 12:26:40 pm[/size][hr]right ive narrowed it down even more, any ideas what the first error is telling me and how too solve it?

Read full topic
item.source: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]

item.title: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]
item.dc:creator: @Ewa_Hax Patrick.
item.description:
@Ewa_Hax wrote:

For height level you must add a c. in front of it because in the Client class it extends to Player and in Player is public static heightLevel = 0; and for player command it cannot find that variable/method.

Read full topic
item.source: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]

item.title: [emulous] help with a custom command. [code and compiler image]
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

can someone tell me why im getting errorrs with this command. its supposed too tele mod plus too a staffzone.

if(c.playerRights >= 1) { 
		if (playercommand.startsWith("staffisland")) {
			c.teleportToX = 2794;
			c.teleportToY = 3322;
			heightLevel = 0;
	     		c.sendMessage("Welcome to the staff island!");
                 		c.sendMessage("Relax with fellow staff and sort players problems out from a distance.");
			} else {
			c.sendMessage("Sorry you are not staff.");
	     }</blockquote>

any ideas?
